name: AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode
desc: The source modes for the input bus of the audio environment node.

items.name: case spatializeIfMono
items.desc: A mono input bus that renders as a point source at the location of the source node.

items.name: case bypass
items.desc: A mode that does no spatial rendering.

items.name: case pointSource
items.desc: All channels of the bus render as a single source at the location of the source node.

items.name: case ambienceBed
items.desc: The input channels spread around the listener as far-field sources that anchor to global space.
